text: managing your light cell instance from
the console is straightforward and
simple just click on the instance name
and you'll be taken to the instance
details page from here you have a number
of options laid out on this horizontal
menu you can use the browser-based SSH
client to connect your instance from the
storage tab you can see your allocated
disks as well as create additional disks
as needed under metrics you can see a
graph of CPU and network utilization as
well as system status checks over
various time periods from one hour to
two weeks the networking tab will allow
you to assign static IP address to your
instance as well as open and close
firewall ports on the snapshots page you
can create new snapshots as well as
delete old snapshots or deploy a new
instance from an existing snapshot the
history tab displays changes in the
instance state over time and then
finally when you're done with an
instance you can delete it right here
from the delete tab
